org.acra.config

Interface ReportingAdministrator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LimitingReportAdministrator

    public interface ReportingAdministrator
    Controls if reports are sent
    Since:
    26.10.2017

    • Method Summary

      default boolean enabled(CoreConfiguration config)
      controls if this instance is active
      default void notifyReportDropped(Context context, CoreConfiguration config)
